byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and RICHARD A. OPPEL JR

abstract: Mitt Romney and Gov. Rick Perry of Texas braced for a more aggressive phase in the campaign following Tuesday’s debate in which both men made clear how deep the animosity between them goes.
snippet: Mitt Romney and Gov. Rick Perry of Texas braced for a more aggressive phase in the campaign following Tuesday’s debate in which both men made clear how deep the animosity between them goes.

headline.main: Debate Suggests Brutish Campaign to Come
